(I hadn't realized Angel Prime had intercepted the shot. I'll just say 
Tavatron was hit by the part that AP hadn't blocked. Thanx for letting me 
know^_^)

Tavatron/Hysteria/CF

Tavatron narrowly dodged the shots to her knee, and got a mouthful of ash in 
the process. She picked herself up from the ground and brushed the majority 
of the black soot from her face and out of her optics. Slag! It was too 
thick! She could barely breath through the thick layer of ash that seemed to 
settle around the CF. Her scanners picked up various signatures, the three 
main ones belonging to the Brotherhood. The other signatures were the 
occasional allies or static ghosts.

In the back of Tavatron's mind Tav began to stir. She growled in her weary 
sleep. Soon she would be strong enough to try again. In the meantime, 
however, she would sleep. The three 'bots who were attacking the base, 
however, were of great interest to her. If only she could gain control of 
this pathetic form!! The blasted slag sucking Tavatron was too damn strong! 
She had never been like this before. It had always been easy to take 
control. Well, Tav sighed in her sleep, she'd just have to try harder next 
time.

Tavatron fired an energy blast from her staff at the energy signature that 
was Sun Crusher.

*****

Hysteria rolled across the top of the CF, barely able to keep from tumbling 
off and crashing into the shields. Eventually she made her way to the center 
of the large covering. She knelt beside a small panel and began to drill and 
weld using various tools from the case she brought with her. The various 
missiles and shots hit the CF and sent ripples through the shields. All the 
while the CF's comp chimed over her comm:

CF comp: Shields at 47% and falling... 44%...
